eu.tivian.musico.net

Class Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.musico.net.Service
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Discogs, Exchange, LastFm, Spotify

    public abstract class Service
extends Object
    Base class for any Internet based content provider which uses JSON output.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        protected abstract InputStream connect(String req)
        Opens the network connection using proper app authorization.
        Parameters:
        req - the URL to connect to.
        Returns:
        input stream or null if the proper connection wasn't established.

      • execute

        protected <T> void execute(String url,
                           Function<JsonReader,T> process,
                           Consumer<T> action)
        Parses the JSON available at the url.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of object to be returned from the external API.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to connect to.
        process - functor which processes the input JSON into the desired object denoted by T type.
        action - functor called after the resource was parsed by the process functor.

      • execute

        protected <T> void execute(String url,
                           Function<JsonReader,T> process,
                           Consumer<T> action,
                           Consumer<Exception> onError)
        Parses the JSON available at the url.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of object to be returned from the external API.
        Parameters:
        url - the URL to connect to.
        process - functor which processes the input JSON into the desired object denoted by T type.
        action - functor called after the resource was parsed by the process functor.
        onError - functor called only if any I/O errors occurred while retrieving information from the server.
